sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"范围，领域"之意。
means: sphere ： 指有明显分界线的范围或领域，强调彼此不会干扰、跨越，各不相关。
domain ： 指知识艺术、兴趣或人类活动的领域。
field ： 主要指经选定在一段时间内作专题研究的方面或领域，含夸张意味。
territory ： 指科学知识、活动等的领域或范围。
province ： 即可指科学、艺术、学问的领域或范围，又可指个人或机关职权的管辖范围。

sentence.Network_en: This area was formerly within the sphere of influence of the US.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一地区先前属于美国的势力范围。

sentence.Network_en: Some scientists relegate parapsychology to the sphere of quackery.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些科学家把灵学归类到骗术范围.

sentence.Network_en: The sculptor rounded the clay into a sphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 那位雕塑家把黏土做成了一个球状.

jx.jx_en_mean: the natural harmonic tones supposedly produced by the movement of the celestial spheres or the bodies fixed in them
jx.jx_cn_mean: 天体音乐（想象中天球运行时所产生的自然音乐）

jx.jx_en_mean: a country or area in which another country has power to affect developments though it has no formal authority

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French espere, from late Latin sphera, earlier sphaera, from Greek sphaira 'ball'

entry.def: A sphere is an object that is completely round in shape like a ball.
A sphere of activity or interest is a particular area of activity or interest.

example.ex: ...nurses, working in all spheres of the health service.
example.tran: 在公共医疗保健服务业的各领域工作的护士们

entry.tran: (社会地位或兴趣等相同的)人群，阶层，圈子
entry.def: A sphere of people is a group of them who are similar in social status or who have the same interests.

example.ex: ...the realities of life outside the government and academic spheres of society.
example.tran: 政府和学术界以外社会阶层的生活现状

entry.tran: (国家的)势力范围，影响所及的范围
entry.def: A country's sphere of influence is an area of the world where it has a lot of influence.

example.ex: They see the region as their natural sphere of influence due to their historical links and a shared language.
example.tran: 基于历史上的联系和共同的语言，他们把该地区看成是自己天然的势力范围。

example.ex: ...countries traditionally within the British or American spheres of influence.
example.tran: 传统上处于英国或美国势力范围内的国家

means.word_mean: 1. a particular environment or walk of life;

sentences.sentence: "it was a closed area of employment"

means.word_mean: 3. the geographical area in which one nation is very influential
4. a particular aspect of life or activity;

sentences.sentence: "he was helpless in an important sector of his life"

means.word_mean: 5. a solid figure bounded by a spherical surface (including the space it encloses)
6. a three-dimensional closed surface such that every point on the surface is equidistant from the center
7. the apparent surface of the imaginary sphere on which celestial bodies appear to be projected

auth_sentence.content: His sphere of influence still endures and grows.
auth_sentence.res_content: His sphere of influence still endures and grows.

sentences.en: The Earth is not a perfect sphere.
sentences.cn: 地球并不是一个完全的球体。

means.word_mean: (兴趣或活动的)范围, 领域, 阶层；界

sentences.cn: 生物学不是我研究的范围。
